org.hibernatespatial.postgis
Class PostgisDialectNG

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect
      org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect
          org.hibernatespatial.postgis.PostgisDialectNG
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hibernatespatial.SpatialDialect
public class PostgisDialectNG
extends org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect
implements org.hibernatespatial.SpatialDialect

Extends the PostgreSQLDialect by also including information on spatial operators, constructors and processing functions.

Author:
Karel Maesen
